name: Me, My Soul, and My Dead Body
name_original: Me, My Soul, and My Dead Body
description:
• Move with [A]/[D] or [→][←]
  • Jump with [SPACEBAR], hold it to jump higher!
  • Use [W]/[S] or [↑][↓] to switch between the living and the soul world!
  • When you fall into the spirit realm, you become a soul and any existing soul faces a fatal death.
  • Spikes will end your life and transform you into the opposite realm
  • Collect bonus stars along the way for an extra puzzling adventure
  • Reach the goal portal in each level to win!

Welcome to "Me, My Soul, and My Dead Body", a puzzle platformer that challenges players to solve mind-bending puzzles and experience the thrill of multiple lives. Made over 7 days for Brackey's Game Jam 2023.1 with the theme of "An End is a New Beginning," our submission offers a unique twist on the traditional platformer genre.

As the player navigates through each puzzle, they must cross into the spirit realm to continue their journey. Each time they do, they are transformed into a soul, and a new living player spawns. The player must control both their living and soul forms to progress, creating for some truly puzzling experiences.

But be warned, crossing into the spirit realm comes with its own set of challenges. Once there, crossing back over results in an untimely death, leaving behind a poor, dead body. Perhaps you can use this new morbid leverage to your advantage!

Thank you to everyone on the team who worked on this project!
